import React, { FunctionComponent, useState } from "react"; import Skin from "../../models/skin"; import getUserById from "../../api-request/user/get-user-by-_id"; import "./style.css" import voidskin from "../../models/void-skin"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; type Props = { skin: Skin clickcard: Function }; const SkinDetail: FunctionComponent = ({ skin, clickcard }) => { var [countfav, setCountfav] = useState(skin.favorite); var [pseudo, setPseudo] = useState("anonymous"); const toogleFavorite = (id: string, type: string) => { if (type === "add") { console.log("adding favorite"); countfav += 1 setCountfav(countfav) //! patch when back done } else if (type === "remove") { console.log("removing favorite"); countfav -= 1 setCountfav(countfav) //! patch when back done } } const handleSelectSkin = () => { clickcard(voidskin); }; const copyValue = (test: string) => { navigator.clipboard.writeText(test); } async function getUserNameById() { const userId = skin.creator; // Remplacez "votre_id_utilisateur" par l'ID de l'utilisateur que vous voulez récupérer const userData = await getUserById(userId); setPseudo(userData.pseudo); // Affiche les données de l'utilisateur récupérées depuis l'API } getUserNameById() return (
back
{skin ? (

Creator :

{pseudo}

{countfav}

{countfav > 0 ? ( toogleFavorite(skin._id, 'remove')}>favorite_border ) : ( toogleFavorite(skin._id, 'add')}>favorite_border )}

Colors :

copyValue(skin.color[0])}>

Peau :

#{skin.color[0]}

copyValue(skin.color[1])}>

Cheveux :

#{skin.color[1]}

copyValue(skin.color[2])}>

Habit 1 :

#{skin.color[2]}

copyValue(skin.color[3])}>

Habit 2 :

#{skin.color[3]}

copyValue(skin.color[4])}>

Habit 3 :

#{skin.color[4]}

Objects :

copyValue(skin.object[2])}>

Coiffe :

{skin.object[2]}

copyValue(skin.object[1])}>

Cape :

{skin.object[1]}

copyValue(skin.object[0])}>

Bouclier :

{skin.object[0]}

copyValue(skin.object[4])}>

Familier :

{skin.object[4]}

{skin.object[3] !== "" ? (
copyValue(skin.object[3])}>

Costume :

{skin.object[3]}

) : null}
) : (

No skin find

)}

image venant de dofusbook.net

) } export default SkinDetail;
